mapper.insert:
insert into TB_PRODITEM (WORKPROD_NO, PRODITEM_END_DT, ITEM_CD, PLN_QTY, PROD_QTY, BAD_QTY, BAD_RES, REMARK, WH_CD, PRODITEM_EMP_ID, PRODITEM_UPDATE, PRODITEM_DELETE_CHK)
values(#{workprod_no}, #{proditem_end_dt}, #{item_cd}, #{pln_qty}, #{prod_qty}, #{bad_qty}, #{bad_res}, #{remark}, #{wh_cd}, #{proditem_emp_id}, CONVERT(CHAR(10),GETDATE(), 23), 0)
